view.GUI

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.GUI.BasicWindow
        • view.GUI.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, View

    public class GUI
extends BasicWindow
implements View
    Implements a GUI View shell to the 3D Maze game. The GUI Class initializing the MazeDisplay shell's buttons, their listeners and the keyboard keys listeners.
    Author:
    Tomer
